snippet: As the Rangers and the Kings, teams from the nation’s two largest markets, meet in the Stanley Cup finals, television viewership is not expected to set a record.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that Stanley Cup finals between the New York Rangers and Los Angeles Kings are not expected to set viewership records; holds that key ingredient missing from NHL viewership is collection of crossover starts who can bring in a lot of casual fans to the postseason.
lead_paragraph: As the Rangers and the Kings, teams from the nation’s two largest markets, meet in the Stanley Cup finals, television viewership is not expected to set a record.

headline.main: In Stanley Cup Finals, Big Markets Don’t Mean Big Viewership
